T16D4406:343b-0: @343b # // yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i bde legs kyi tshugs su bcad pa /
T16D4406:343b-1: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4406:343b-2: gang la ser sna rnam chags pa //
T16D4406:343b-3: rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad pa //
T16D4406:343b-4: thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' ste //
T16D4406:343b-5: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
T16D4406:343b-7: thar ba'i lam du 'dzin mdzad cing //
T16D4406:343b-8: chos rnams thams cad ston pa de //
T16D4406:343b-9: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
T16D4406:343b-10: ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten //
T16D4406:343b-11: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T16D4406:343b-12: gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de //
T16D4406:343b-13: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur ;
T16D4406:343b-14: / skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi //
T16D4406:343b-16: bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyang de //
T16D4406:343b-17: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
T16D4406:343b-19: sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing //
T16D4406:343b-20: gling dang dbung gnyen gyur pa de //
T16D4406:344a-2: gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur //
T16D4406:344a-3: gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la //
T16D4406:344a-4: gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de //
T16D4406:344a-5: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
T16D4406:344a-6: dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas //
T16D4406:344a-7: phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing //
T16D4406:344a-8: don 'grub tshogs kyang grub pa de //
T16D4406:344a-9: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
T16D4406:344a-10: gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni //
T16D4406:344a-11: nags tshal bcas pa rab g-yos nas //
T16D4406:344a-12: sems can thams cad rab dga' des //
T16D4406:344a-13: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
T16D4406:344a-14: byang chub snying por gang zhig gis //
T16D4406:344a-15: sa rnams rnam drug g-yos gyur cing //
T16D4406:344a-16: bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des //
T16D4406:344a-17: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
T16D4406:344a-18: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni //
T16D4406:344a-19: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsungs pas //
T16D4406:344a-20: thub pa'i grags pa gang byung de //
T16D4406:344a-21: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
T16D4406:344a-22: yid 'phrog gang zhig mu stegs byed ;
T16D4406:344a-23: / thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing //
T16D4406:344a-24: tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de //
T16D4406:344a-25: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
T16D4406:344a-26: sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad //
T16D4406:344a-27: brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang //
T16D4406:344a-28: 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni //
T16D4406:344a-29: khyed la dus kun sbyin gyur cig / sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang //
T16D4406:344a-30: lha rnams kyis ni bsam pa yis //
T16D4406:344a-31: khyod kyi don 'dod gang yin pa //
T16D4406:344a-32: don de di ring 'grub gyur cig / rkang gnyis
T16D4406:344a-33: khyed cag bde legs shog / rkang bzhi khyed cag
T16D4406:344a-34: bde legs shog / khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs
T16D4406:344a-35: shog / phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /
T16D4406:344a-36: nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs //
T16D4406:344a-37: nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing //
T16D4406:344a-38: khyed rnams kun du bde legs shog / khyed cag
T16D4406:344a-39: sdig par ma gyur cig / sangs rgyas lha ni
T16D4406:344a-40: stong rnams kyis // yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis //
T16D4406:344a-41: sdang sems can rnams byer gyur cig / snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod //
T16D4406:344a-42: sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang //
T16D4406:344a-43: dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis //
T16D4406:344a-44: 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams //
T16D4406:344a-45: grong khyer 'di ni stong gyur cig / sems can kun dang srog chags kun //
T16D4406:344a-46: 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun //
T16D4406:344b-0: bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur @344b cig / thams
T16D4406:344b-1: cad nad ni med gyur cig / kun gyis bzang
T16D4406:344b-2: po mthong gyur cig / gang yang sdig par ma
T16D4406:344b-3: gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur
T16D4406:344b-4: cing // sa'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa rnams //
T16D4406:344b-5: skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing //
T16D4406:344b-6: nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog /
